name: bitsadmin.exe
pattern: {"query": "select * from file WHERE directory = 'C:\\Windows\\Prefetch\\' and filename like '%bitsadmin%';", "interval": 600, "description": "Bitsadmin Execute, Windows Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) is a low-bandwidth, asynchronous file transfer mechanism exposed through Component Object Model (COM) - ATT&CK T1197,S0190", "platform": "windows"}
